Hero.subtitle: A summer retreat where rhythm meets nature.
Hero.subtitle2: A week to disconnect, dance, play and belong.

djembe.title: Djembe
djembe.description: Learn traditional West African rhythms. From basic patterns to advanced solo techniques.

dance.title: Dance
dance.description: Movement that tells stories. Traditional Guinean dance for all bodies and rhythms.

balafon.title: Balafon
balafon.description: The wooden piano of Africa. An introduction to the ancestral instrument with master Famoudou.
